entry.title: Fractional derviatives
entry.content:
This is the one of best videos I've seen on about fractional derivatives. Maybe there are applications for taylor series style approximation.

What Lies Between a Function and Its Derivative? (SoME2) | Fractional Calculus - YouTube

.. youtube:: 2dwQUUDt5Is

entry.title: Presentation order of Prof. Mattuck
entry.summary:
Lec 3 | MIT 18.03 Differential Equations, Spring 2006 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tVzaX9u6YAE

First a diagram to cement the situation. Clearly label the variables and distinguish them, completely squash all false assumptions people have brewing in their heads.

$$T$$ is temperature, not time.

relate back to newton's â€¦
entry.content:
Lec 3 | MIT 18.03 Differential Equations, Spring 2006 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tVzaX9u6YAE

First a diagram to cement the situation. Clearly label the variables and distinguish them, completely squash all false assumptions people have brewing in their heads.

$$T$$ is temperature, not time.

relate back to newton's law of cooling

The heat flows from the outside to the inside. By convention the flow has a direction.
